name: SCIGRIP® SG100-15
description: SCIGRIP® SG100-15 is a two-component, 10:1 mix ratio product for bonding thermoplastics, metals, composites and combinations thereof. These bright white, UV resistant products are particularly well suited in color critical applications without compromising physical properties. Minimal surface preparation1, 2 combined with a choice of 15 and 40 minute working times, provide reduced labor and production cycle time. Packaging options include 490 ml cartridges and 5 and 50 gallon (19 and 189 liters) in bulk containers for application with meter-mix dispense equipment.
